affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
cmb:
85/105/125/145
5.50
lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
name: pugna_nether_blast

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
notes: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.
attrib:
ALLY INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 25%
ALLY MOVE SLOW: 25%
ENEMY INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 30%/40%/50%/60%
ENEMY MOVE SLOW: 30%/40%/50%/60%
DURATION: 3.5
cmb:
60
15/12/9/6
lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
name: pugna_decrepify

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Pugna places a nether ward that fires mana flares at enemy heroes who dare to cast spells, while also causing them to lose mana.  Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.  Lasts 30 seconds.
notes:
Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect.
Nether Ward can be decrepified.
Nether Ward has 4 HP. Heroes can attack it for 1 damage, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
attrib:
WARD ATTACK RADIUS: 1600
DAMAGE PER MANA: 1/1.25/1.5/1.75
MANA LEAK: 1.5/3/4.5/6
ATTACKS TO DESTROY: 4/4/4/4
cmb:
80/80/80/80
35
lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
name: pugna_nether_ward

affects:
ABILITY: Channeled, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Heroes
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.
When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
HP drained depends on the actual damage dealt.
Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.
attrib:
DRAIN PER SECOND: 150/185/220
CAST RANGE: 900/1050/1200
MAX DURATION: 10
SCEPTER DRAIN PER SECOND: 180/240/300
cmb:
125/175/225
22
lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
name: pugna_life_drain
